altername_name: Mortal Kombat Revelations by Dark Eva
Mortal Kombat Revelations by Dark Eva v1.00
name: Mortal Kombat Revelations
overview: This is a hack of Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 for the Sega Genesis. It adds nearly all legit characters from Mortal Kombat 1, 2, and Trilogy, and adds additional characters that were not in the former Ultimate Mortal Kombat Trilogy Patch now giving you a total of 50 playable characters! It also adds backgrounds, new moves, combos, finishing moves, and missing audio samples are restored. It’s the ultimate Mortal Kombat hack done again!
